original: 劉備部將，曾參與曹劉相爭的漢中之戰，在戰時負傷，得趙雲相助，殺出重圍。《演義》中為黃忠副將，大致經歷與正史雷同。
text: General Liu Bei, who participated in the battle of Hanzhong where Cao and Liu fought, was wounded during the war, and Zhao Yun helped him to get out of the siege. In 'The Romance', he is Vice Admiral Huang Zhong, whose general experience is similar to that of Zheng Shi.
